name: Zadzen Games [OUT OF BUSINESS]
description:
Zadzen Games is a team of more than 30+ skilled technology enthusiasts and passionate gamers. Based on our expirience and skillset, we are offering creating game from scratch to publishing and post-release support. We are making addictive and fun-to-play games.
Our Services:
Custom Game Development
Game design
Custom entire game development
SFX, VFX programming for games
CG, AI & tools programming
Network programming
Game Art Production
Designing creative concepts
3D character modelling
Texturing & rigging
Environment & object design
Game Co-Production
VR/AR Development
Zadzen Games closed in 2019
